summary: hey everyone! please channel your excitement over stephen colbert playing dnd with matthew mercer and donate here for red nose...
body:
hey everyone! please channel your excitement over stephen colbert playing dnd with matthew mercer and donate here for red nose day - a fundraising event to end child poverty!

the goal is $50,000, and by donating, you get to cast a vote for what stephen’s character class, companion, legendary weapon to be sought, and who the big bad villain will be!

the polls will run until Sunday, May 19th, but they will still be accepting donations until Red Nose Day, on May 23rd!

poll/donation link

more info

red nose day website

summary: Laura: Well Jester is learning that maybe romance does not work like she thought it did. Shippers: FJORD-JESTER IS DEAD LONG...
body:
Laura: Well Jester is learning that maybe romance does not work like she thought it did.

Shippers: FJORD-JESTER IS DEAD LONG LIVE OUR SHIPS!

Okay people, I get wanting your ship to be canon but grabbing every last loose straw to build a shipping house over makes those ships look about as sane as Zutara ever was.

tags: its just weird seeing tibs content again
summary: I read all of the vox machina comics at 4am or so. The art? amazing and wonderful. My favorite gal keyleth is so precious i love...
body:
I read all of the vox machina comics at 4am or so. The art? amazing and wonderful. My favorite gal keyleth is so precious i love her. Lastly, tiberius is a tragedy.

The first time i attempted to watch critical role i didnt get very far. Tibs was my favorite, i thought he was just a silly and funny dragon man. The second attempt i had learned about orion’s dirt and i got sick of him real quick. I like the way tibs is written in the comic so far, and i enjoy seeing just the character without the man who made him.

tags: ....also I still want that ''caduceus starts running cognitive behavioural therapy group sessions for his new family'' fic
summary: Fic I want: after some time in Rosohna, Caduceus notices that several members of the Mighty Nein (probably including himself)...
body: Fic I want: after some time in Rosohna, Caduceus notices that several members of the Mighty Nein (probably including himself) are starting to show symptoms of SAD, due to lack of sunlight. But luckily, he’s already made some sun lamps, for his garden! So they end up having compulsory “sitting in front of the tree lights” time each day, which eventually becomes a bonding ritual for everyone
